reviews.review_msg: Baran is a fantastic lecturer. Their classes were always engaging and easy to follow, and it was clear they truly enjoy working with students and teaching the course. On top of that, Baran is caring, showing genuine concern for each student and offering extra help. They're also very understanding and easy to talk to 10/10 recommend

I mean I haven't read this much for a class, but his class was so fun and engaging. He's available during and out of the classroom and is so caring and accommodating when it's about assignments or help with the course material.
Very Smart. Very Clear lectures. Very fast. Dry Humour, and will take time to explain when you need it. Also, a very fair guy.
